title: My ping(400-above) wont go down
body:
Hey guys,

A few days ago while playing league, my ping would always be around 80-120, and that's the best it can reach due to my region, It's totally fine.
But, yesterday my ping skyrocketed to about 500-above, and then today; 400-above, and it wouldn't go down regardless of what I do. 
I've tried to restart the router, even changed the password to check if anyone of the household members was responsible of the lag, Also tried to repair client(although I highly doubt it was due to the client), I also reinstalled the game(also doubt that's the reason). If anyone has some sort of solution for this problem, please... do share ;-;

replies.body: That ping is pretty huge! :(  Are you running on wifi at all?  It could either be a degradation in your network, or even how your ISP is routing to the game server.  A traceroute can help us really know for sure.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 31.186.224.42.  Run it for about 5 minutes, replace the IP address with dashes on the first two rows only, and let me know what you find.
